synopsis.text:
Aki Itou, an ordinary high school girl with a love for books, stray cats, and daydreaming about her crush, finds herself navigating the complexities of first love in the anime "Debut." Working up the courage to connect with the charming boy from her favorite restaurant, Aki wonders if their relationship will blossom or if misunderstandings will keep them apart.

In a separate tale within the same anime, Aki and her friends Saori and Itou revisit a time capsule they buried a decade ago beneath a tree at their elementary school. Anticipation fills the air as they uncover their cherished memories, only to discover an unexpected fourth box among their own. Unable to recall who the fourth box belongs to, the girls embark on a nostalgic journey to unravel the mystery of their forgotten friend. Will they be able to solve the enigma and reconnect with their past? Join Aki and her friends as they experience the joys and challenges of love, friendship, and self-discovery in "Debut."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
